Name: Never Let Me Awake
About the game: Never Let Me Awake is a first-person psychological survival horror game. Plot Land development has been decided to be done in a certain area of the United States. They found that there is one house in the area where land development takes place. They tried to contact the house to know whether it is abandoned or not. However, there was no reaction from the house at all. Therefore, one investigator was dispatched to the house. Features Health-and-consuming lamp systems Psychological horror experience Physics puzzles to find a next way Mathematical puzzles to find out passwords Unexpected ending Estimated playing time : 2-3 hours ALL YOU NEED IS RUN SURVIVE HIDE
